updates.title: New Library Hours Announcement
updates.description: The university library will now be open 24/7 during exam weeks. Regular hours remain unchanged for non-exam periods.

updates.title: Campus Wi-Fi Upgrade
updates.description: IT Services will be upgrading the campus-wide Wi-Fi infrastructure. Expect brief interruptions during the upgrade process.

updates.title: New Food Court Opening
updates.description: Exciting news! A new food court featuring diverse cuisine options will be opening next week in the Student Center.
